short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control Youtube clients on your network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wished you could control YouTube on any device in your home without the hassle of setting up remote desktop software or paying for more "Premium controls"?

Use your local network to seamless YouTube remote control hub! Whether you're hosting a party and need to DJ from your phone or simply want to control your YouTube playlist from the comfort of your couch, our extension has got you covered.

***Important***
This extension only works with other devices on the same network!!!!
 
Works with YouTube and YouTube Music
Cross platform/browser. Mix and match, it doesn't matter
Full Youtube Nonstop compatibility 

If you have any problems, don't hesitate to create an issue ðŸ¤™
